articles.title: Firing workers from US weather and oceans agency risks lives and the economy, former agency heads warn - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: NOAA's 301 billion weather forecasts every year reach 96% of American households.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The federal weather and oceans agency touches people’s daily lives in unnoticed ways, so massive firings there will likely cause needless deaths and a big hit to America’s economy, ac… [+6419 chars]
